programme.title: Uz sapni ar mazo
programme.desc: Ceļojumu raidījums par ekstrēmu, traku, no sirds lolotu sapņu īstenošanu, kur aktieru pāris Ieva Florence-Vīksne un Oskars Florencs-Vīksne kopā ar abu mazuli Leonardu dodas uz dažādām vietām pasaulē un piepildot savus sapņus. Kā īstenot sapņus, ceļojot kopā ar bērnu? Kādas ir grūtības, pienākumi un ieguvumi? Ģimene iepazīs dažādu valstu kultūru un vēsturi ar bērna acīm, metoties ekstrēmos, galvu reibinošos un sajūtām pilnos piedzīvojumos.

programme.title: SuperBingo
programme.desc: Loterijas Superbingo TV šova skatītājus svētdienas rītos priecē vadītājas Krista Zvirgzdiņa un Ligita Mieze, kā arī atraktīvais Armands Simsons.

programme.title: Dziedi! 2
programme.desc: Vienmēr optimistiskais koala Basters Mūns un viņa zvaigžņu izpildītāju grupa gatavojas žilbinošākajam skatuves notikumam pasaules izklaides galvaspilsētā. Ir tikai viena ķibele: viņiem ir jāpārliecina rokzvaigzne lauva Klejs Kelovejs viņiem pievienoties. Lai to izdarītu, Basteram un viņa dziedošajai komandai – daudzsivēnu mammai Rositai, dzeloņcūkai Ešai, gorillam Džonijam, kautrīgajai zilonītei Mīnai un, protams, ruksītim Ginteram – būs jābūt uzdevuma augstumos, lai apvestu ap stūri lielo, pelēko magnātu vilku Džimiju. Ja viņiem izdosies pierunāt lauvu pievienoties, Bastera jaunais šovs krāšņajā Redšoras pilsētā būs patiesi neaizmirstams!

programme.title: Pasaules smieklīgāko video kuriozu top 10 3
programme.desc: Ik dienu pasaulē notiek negaidīti, pārsteidzoši, neveikli un smieklīgi gadījumi – īsti kuriozi. Labi, ja tādos brīžos pa rokai gadījusies videokamera, un šie jautrie gadījumi ir iemūžināti. Raidījums apkopojis smieklīgākos video kuriozus no visas pasaules.

programme.title: Titāniks
programme.desc: Savā pirmajā braucienā dodas pasaules lielākais kuģis “Titāniks”. Uz kuģa klāja tūkstošiem cilvēku ar cerībām un bailēm gaida nokļūšanu galamērķī – Amerikā. Starp šiem cilvēkiem ir nabadzīgs mākslinieks Džeks, kā arī septiņpadsmit gadu vecā Roza – skaista un bagāta meitene, kurai apnikusi vecāku ārišķīgā un liekulīgā pasaule. “Titānika” būvētāji ir pārliecināti par to, ka kuģi nav iespējams nogremdēt, taču kad kuģa ceļā gadās milzīgs aisbergs, Rozas un Džeka romantiskais piedzīvojums pārvēršas cīņā par izdzīvošanu.

programme.title: Zelenska stāsts
programme.desc: Kas par cilvēku ir Ukrainas sestais prezidents Volodimirs Zelenskis? Ko par sevi var pastāstīt viņš pats un ko saka paši tuvākie – sieva un draugi? No aktiera, komiķa, uzņēmēja, šovmena un savas valsts patriota par Ukrainas Valsts prezidentu – trīs sēriju dokumentālajā miniseriālā atklāj, kāds bija Volodimira Zelenska ceļš un pārliecība, kas neļāva bēgt, kad valstī masīvi iebruka Krievijas armija.

programme.title: Nekā Personīga
programme.desc: Raidījums “Nekā personīga” ik svētdienu saviem skatītājiem piedāvā nedēļas notikumu un procesu skaidrojumu un atklāj norises, kas būs svarīgas arī turpmāk. Raidījuma komanda ir par godīgu un atbildīgu politiku, kas Latviju padarītu par plaukstošu iespēju zemi.

programme.title: Dungeons and Dragons: Gods zagļu vidū
programme.desc: Pēc diviem gadiem nebrīvē Edžinam un Holgai izdodas aizbēgt no Ledusvēju ielejas. Atgriezušies dzimtenē, viņi atklāj, ka bijušais biedrs Fordžs ir ne tikai pārņēmis kontroli pār pilsētu, bet arī piesavinājies vērtīgu artefaktu. Kopā ar saviem kompanjoniem Saimonu, Doriku un Ksenku viņi piesaka karu varas alkstošajam nelietim.

programme.title: Maza dzinēja remonts
programme.desc: Frenks, Svaino un Pakijs ir labākie draugi, kurus vieno mīlestība pret beisbolu un motoriem. Frenka meita Kristala visiem ir kā meita, kuru viņi redzējuši pieaugam. Taču tad Frenks uzaicina savus draugus uz viskiju un lūdz viņiem izdarīt kādu pakalpojumu. Frenks grib pārmācīt puisi, kurš izmanto viņa meitu, taču viss iziet ārpus kontroles.

programme.title: Dūru cīņas Donibrukā
programme.desc: Bijušais jūras kājnieks Ērls ir gatavs darīt jebko, lai savai ģimenei nodrošinātu labāku dzīvi. Psihopātiskais metamfetamīna dīleris Anguss aiz sevis atstāj nāvi, lai kur viņš dotos. Un viņa noslēpumainajai māsai Delijai vairs nav ko zaudēt. Šo trīs cilvēku ceļi krustojas trīs dienas ilgajās, nelegālajās dūru cīņās Donībrukā. Uzvarētāju gaida naudas balva 100 000 dolāru apmērā un labāka dzīve. Zaudētāju... gaida nāve.

programme.title: Ugunsgrēks 6
programme.desc: Kad beidzās iepriekšējā sezona, Elizabete cerēja, ka tēvs apturēs viņas kāzas ar Denisu. Ziemelis nebija pārliecināts, vai Elizabetes laulības nav tikai blefs. Mērijas paziņojums pārliecināja Ziemeli, ka Elizabete kāzas uztver nopietni. Leons meloja Ziemelim, ka viņam nav izdevies Elizabeti atturēt no pārsteidzīgā soļa. Ziemelis steidzās uz cietumu, lai apturētu kāzas. Mācītājs uzsāka laulību ceremoniju, un Elizabetei bija jādod laulību zvērests. Bet ar ko tas beidzās? Tagad noskaidrosim, ar ko spraigie notikumi turpināsies seriāla jaunajā sezonā!

programme.title: Krāsa ārpus kosmosa
programme.desc: Gārdneru ģimene ilgojas pēc miera un pārmaiņām, tādēļ pārceļas uz dzīvi laukos. Taču kādā naktī viņu pagalmā nogāžas meteorīts, sev līdzi atnesot pārmaiņas, kurām neviens uz šīs planētas nav gatavs. Gārdneriem nu nākas cīnīties ar ārpuszemes organismu, kas inficē visu sev apkārt esošo, un ģimenei par šausmām – arī viņu prātus un ķermeni.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā spilgtākie mirkļi 22
programme.desc: Mežonīgākie, neticamākie, aizraujošākie raidījuma "Gāzi grīdā" mirkļi, leģendāri atgadījumi un, protams, unikālā motorgalvu un kaismīgo autobraucēju trijotne Džeremijs Klarksons, Ričards Hamonds un Džeimss Mejs.

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā spilgtākie mirkļi 22
programme.desc: Mežonīgākie, neticamākie, aizraujošākie raidījuma "Gāzi grīdā" mirkļi, leģendāri atgadījumi un, protams, unikālā motorgalvu un kaismīgo autobraucēju trijotne Džeremijs Klarksons, Ričards Hamonds un Džeimss Mejs.

programme.title: Mana trakā ģimene 18
programme.desc: Pavisam “parasto” Grifinu ģimeni no izdomātās Rodailendas pilsētiņas droši var raksturot kā neaudzinātu, izlutinātu un absolūti nekorektu. Pītera un Luisas Grifinu jaunākais bērns ir inteliģents, sadistisks mazulis, kurš pastāvīgi meklē savu māti un kaļ plānus par pasaules pārņemšanu. Dēlam Krisam ir tikpat zems intelekta līmenis kā viņa tēvam, meita Mega veltīgi cenšas sadraudzēties ar “foršajiem cilvēkiem”, taču vienmēr tiek atstumta. Tikmēr runājošais un martīni malkojošais ģimenes suns Braiens ir vienīgais, kam ir kaut kripatiņa saprāta.

programme.title: Krimināli smieklīgi
programme.desc: Noziedznieki mēdz būt neģēlīgi, zemiski, baisi, nekrietni un arī... krimināli smieklīgi. Šī ir tava iespēja savām acīm skatīt dažus no nejēdzīgākajiem, dīvainākajiem un idiotiskākajiem noziedzniekiem, ko šī planēta var piedāvāt. Videonovērošanas kadri un ar telefonu uzņemti aculiecinieku video, kas liks nosarkt likumpārkāpēja vietā. No zagļiem, ko aizraida vecas, sirmas kundzītes, līdz caur griestiem krītošiem laupītājiem – skaties un uzjautrinies!

programme.title: Mini pa trim
programme.desc: Attapības spēle ģimenei un draugiem, kuru vada aktieris Mārtiņš Počs. Spēle norisināsies “Draudzīgajā kafejnīcā”, kur vairākās kārtās tiek meklētas pareizās atbildes uz dažādiem jautājumiem. Spēle norisinās, sacenšoties trim komandām, kurās apvienojušās sabiedrībā pazīstamas personas ar ģimeni vai draugiem!

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā spilgtākie mirkļi 22
programme.desc: Mežonīgākie, neticamākie, aizraujošākie raidījuma "Gāzi grīdā" mirkļi, leģendāri atgadījumi un, protams, unikālā motorgalvu un kaismīgo autobraucēju trijotne Džeremijs Klarksons, Ričards Hamonds un Džeimss Mejs.

programme.title: Simpsoni 32
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta vārdā Springfīlda. Šai gluži parastajā pilsētā dzīvo gluži parasta ģimene Simpsoni: papus Homērs, dumiķis, kas strādā kodolreaktorā; visnotaļ prātīgā mamma Mārdža, mājsaimniece; izcili gudrā un talantīgā mazā Liza; viņas brālis dauzoņa Bārts un mazā Megija. Lai gan ģimene šķiet visnotaļ ikdienišķa, viņu dzīve ir neparastiem notikumiem bagāta un skar mūs visus interesējošas tēmas – no attiecībām ģimenē līdz pat pilsētas un visas cilvēces nākotnei...

programme.title: Simpsoni 32

programme.title: Pasaules kauss kamaniņās 2024/25. Phjončhana. Vīriešu un sieviešu divnieku 1. brauciens
Pasaules kauss kamaniņās 2024/25. Phjončhana. Vīriešu un sieviešu divnieku 2. brauciens
Mītu grāvēji 10
programme.desc: Filmās un seriālos bieži vien notiek kas tāds, kas liek aizdomāties – vai tas tiešām ir iespējams? Šajā šovā ar eksperimentu palīdzību tiks pārbaudīti visdažādākie mīti, piemēram – vai izšaujot lodi var aizdedzināt sērkociņu, vai no ausu sēra iespējams uztaisīt sveci, vai cilvēks apčurājas, ja miegā viņa rokas iemērc siltā ūdenī un tamlīdzīgi. Raidījuma vadītājiem palīdz pieredzes bagāti specefektu veidotāji, un kopā viņi noskaidros, kas no televīzijā redzētā patiesībā ir iespējams.

programme.title: Neticamā planēta Zeme
programme.desc: Tici vai ne, bet uz mūsu planētas ir daudz ļoti neparastu dabas parādību! Kā rodas luminiscējoši, elektriski zili viļņi, kas skalojas krastā? Kādēļ zemes virsmu klāj noslēpumaini apļi, kas sniedzas, cik tālu vien acs spēj saskatīt? Dažām no šīm brīnumainajām parādībām var rast izskaidrojumu, bet citas pārsteidz pat vispieredzējušākos zinātniekus. Dodies ceļojumā pa plašo planētu, lai atklātu, cik dīvaina un neizdibināma ir mūsu pasaule!

programme.title: Neticamā planēta Zeme
programme.desc: Tici vai ne, bet uz mūsu planētas ir daudz ļoti neparastu dabas parādību! Kā rodas luminiscējoši, elektriski zili viļņi, kas skalojas krastā? Dodies ceļojumā pa plašo planētu, lai atklātu, cik dīvaina un neizdibināma ir mūsu pasaule!

programme.title: Zebra. Zebra Yr 9 (2025) Ep. 906
programme.desc: Raidījuma vadmotīvs ir nemainīgs – drošība un ātrums! Tēmu loks tāpat – satiksmes drošība, satiksmes organizācija un iespējamie risinājumi. Transportlīdzekļu vadītājiem un gājējiem saistošu likumu un noteikumu izmaiņas, Eiropas valstu pieredze satiksmes problēmu risināšanā. Sava daļa stāstu būs atvēlēta sportiem, kas saistīti ar ātrumu. Raidījums visiem, kas ceļā! Raidījuma vadītājs – Pauls Timrots.

programme.title: NHL 2024/25. Četru nāciju turnīrs 2025. Somija - Zviedrija
Lūkass
programme.desc: Lūkass (Žans Klods van Damme) pēc sievas nāves aizbēg no Dienvidāfrikas, lai dzīvotu Eiropā un rūpētos par savu astoņgadīgo meitu. Viņš strādā naktsklubā par durvju sargu, tomēr kādu dienu Lūkass zaudē kontroli, iesaistoties kautiņā ar klientu. Lūkasu uzreiz atlaiž no darba, meita tiek atņemta, bet viņš pats nokļūst cietumā. Viss vēl vairāk sarežģās vīrieša dzīvē, kad kolēģis piedāvā līdzīgu darbu striptīza klubā. Vienlaikus Lūkasu uzrunā arī Interpola aģents, apmaiņā pret meitu piespiežot ievākt informāciju par nakts kluba īpašnieka darījumiem.

programme.title: Pārkāpt robežu 2
programme.desc: Volters Vaits ir ķīmijas skolotājs. Viņam jau ir dēls invalīds un sieva gaida vēl vienu bērnu. Skolotāja alga ir maza, tādēļ Volters piestrādā automazgātavā, kur skolnieki labprāt izmanto iespēju gan par viņu, gan slimo dēlu paņirgāties. Voltera svainis savukārt strādā Narkotiku apkarošanas nodaļā un reiz Volteram piedāvā iespēju piedalīties operācijā kādā metamfetamīna laboratorijā. Operācijas laikā Volts redz, kā viens dīleris aizbēg, un tas izrādās viņa bijušais skolnieks. Volts nolemj sākt nodarboties ar narkotiku ražošanu, jo zaudēt vairs nav ko – dakteris ir paziņojis, ka viņam ir plaušu vēzis. Volts kopā ar jauno pārinieku noīrē treileri, kuru pārtaisa par laboratoriju un nogādā tuksneša vidū. Var jau būt, ka šis bizness ir ienesīgs, bet tas prasa stiprus nervus...

programme.title: Pārkāpt robežu 2
programme.desc: Volters Vaits ir ķīmijas skolotājs. Viņam jau ir dēls invalīds un sieva gaida vēl vienu bērnu. Skolotāja alga ir maza, tādēļ Volters piestrādā automazgātavā, kur skolnieki labprāt izmanto iespēju gan par viņu, gan slimo dēlu paņirgāties. Voltera svainis savukārt strādā Narkotiku apkarošanas nodaļā un reiz Volteram piedāvā iespēju piedalīties operācijā kādā metamfetamīna laboratorijā. Operācijas laikā Volts redz, kā viens dīleris aizbēg, un tas izrādās viņa bijušais skolnieks. Volts nolemj sākt nodarboties ar narkotiku ražošanu, jo zaudēt vairs nav ko – dakteris ir paziņojis, ka viņam ir plaušu vēzis. Volts kopā ar jauno pārinieku noīrē treileri, kuru pārtaisa par laboratoriju un nogādā tuksneša vidū. Var jau būt, ka šis bizness ir ienesīgs, bet tas prasa stiprus nervus...

programme.title: Mītu grāvēji: lūk, tava problēma!
programme.desc: Trieciendrošās brilles uz acīm, ugunsdzēšamais aparāts gatavībā – laiks eksperimentiem mītu grāvēju stilā! Pieredzes bagātie specefektu meistari Ādams Sevidžs un Džeimijs Hainemans desmit gadu garumā testējuši, vai Holivudas radītie mīti un urbānās leģendas iet roku rokā ar fizikas likumiem. Īpaši jaudīgākie, iespaidīgākie un pārsteidzošākie eksperimenti no Mītu grāvēju kolekcijas nu apkopoti unikālās un jautrās tematiskajās sērijās. Šajā triecienu, sprādzienu un blīkšķu enciklopēdijā atradīsies gan tādas tēmas kā ūdens, gāze, gravitācija, gan enerģija un spiediens.

programme.title: NHL 2024/25. Četru nāciju turnīrs 2025. ASV - Kanāda
Sporta momenti
programme.desc: Dokumentālās sērijas aplūko aizraujošos stāstus, ko atklāj slavenākās fotogrāfijas sporta vēsturē. Iemūžinātie mirkļi ataino spilgtākos divdesmitā gadsimta atlētus, kā arī ilustrē svarīgus momentus, kas mainījuši sporta vēstures gaitu.

programme.title: Mini pa trim 2
programme.desc: Attapības spēle ģimenei un draugiem, kuru vada aktieris Mārtiņš Počs. Spēle norisināsies “Draudzīgajā kafejnīcā”, kur vairākās kārtās tiek meklētas pareizās atbildes uz dažādiem jautājumiem. Spēle norisinās, sacenšoties trim komandām, kurās apvienojušās sabiedrībā pazīstamas personas ar ģimeni vai draugiem!

programme.title: Gāzi grīdā spilgtākie mirkļi 22
programme.desc: Mežonīgākie, neticamākie, aizraujošākie raidījuma "Gāzi grīdā" mirkļi, leģendāri atgadījumi un, protams, unikālā motorgalvu un kaismīgo autobraucēju trijotne Džeremijs Klarksons, Ričards Hamonds un Džeimss Mejs.

programme.title: Simpsoni 32
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta vārdā Springfīlda. Šai gluži parastajā pilsētā dzīvo gluži parasta ģimene Simpsoni: papus Homērs, dumiķis, kas strādā kodolreaktorā; visnotaļ prātīgā mamma Mārdža, mājsaimniece; izcili gudrā un talantīgā mazā Liza; viņas brālis dauzoņa Bārts un mazā Megija. Lai gan ģimene šķiet visnotaļ ikdienišķa, viņu dzīve ir neparastiem notikumiem bagāta un skar mūs visus interesējošas tēmas – no attiecībām ģimenē līdz pat pilsētas un visas cilvēces nākotnei...

programme.title: Simpsoni 32
programme.desc: Kaut kur Amerikas vidū ir pilsēta vārdā Springfīlda. programme.title: Simpsoni 33
programme.desc: Vairāk nekā simts nomināciju un tikpat daudz balvu, zvaigzne Holivudas slavas alejā, episkas varoņu frāzes, kas iekļuvušas vārdnīcu lappusēs, pirmais “Playboy” animācijas tēla vāks vēsturē, nepārtrauktas pārraides vairāk nekā 30 gadu garumā, sveiciens no Vatikāna gadadienā un miljoniem fanu visā pasaulē! Šis ir animācijas seriāls “Simpsoni” un tā dzeltenie varoņi – Homērs, Mārdža, Bārts, Liza un mazā Megija!

programme.title: Pasaules kauss kamaniņās 2024/25. Phjončhana. Jaukto pāru sacensības - divnieki
Pasaules kauss kamaniņās 2024/25. Phjončhana. Jaukto pāru sacensības - vieninieki
Mītu grāvēji 10
programme.desc: Filmās un seriālos bieži vien notiek kas tāds, kas liek aizdomāties – vai tas tiešām ir iespējams? Šajā šovā ar eksperimentu palīdzību tiks pārbaudīti visdažādākie mīti, piemēram – vai izšaujot lodi var aizdedzināt sērkociņu, vai no ausu sēra iespējams uztaisīt sveci, vai cilvēks apčurājas, ja miegā viņa rokas iemērc siltā ūdenī un tamlīdzīgi. Raidījuma vadītājiem palīdz pieredzes bagāti specefektu veidotāji, un kopā viņi noskaidros, kas no televīzijā redzētā patiesībā ir iespējams.

programme.title: Dzīve Aļaskas spelgonī. Jauna ēra 3
programme.desc: Vai spēj iztēloties, kāda ir Aļaskā dzīvojošo ikdiena? Šis lielākais un reizē vismazāk apdzīvotais štats ASV ir mājvieta drosmīgiem, sīkstiem ļaudīm, kuru ikdienu nosaka dabas mātes labvēlība. Dokumentālās sērijas piedāvā iepazīt jauno Aļaskas iedzīvotāju paaudzi, kas spēlē pēc saviem noteikumiem, iestājas pret iesīkstējušiem uzskatiem un uz savas ādas izbauda arktiskā klimata priekšrocības un izaicinājumus.

programme.title: Fatal
programme.desc: Pēc mežonīga vienas nakts sakara veiksmīga sporta aģenta ideālā dzīve pamazām sabrūk, kad viņš atklāj, ka seksīgā un noslēpumainā sieviete, kuras dēļ viņš riskēja ar visu, ir policijas detektīve, kas viņu iesaista savā jaunākajā izmeklēšanā. Izmisīgi cenšoties izprast notiekošo, viņš iekrīt viņas slazdā, riskējot ar savu ģimeni, karjeru un pat dzīvību.

programme.title: Pamestie superprojekti 8
programme.desc: Dokumentālo filmu sērija aplūko inženierijas meistardarbus, kas reiz izcēlās ar savu varenību un izsmalcinātību, bet tagad ir pamesti un pārvērtušies drupās. No pamestām brīvdienu paradīzēm līdz apokaliptiska paskata augstceltnēm – kā baismīgi rēgi tās atgādina par aizgājušo gadu nepiepildītajiem sapņiem. Kādēļ šīs būves tikušas pamestas novārtā?

programme.title: Adolf Hitler: Decoding A Dictator
programme.sub-title: To determine how Der Fuhrers secrets may have shaped the man behind the tyrant, we need to examine his troubled childhood and sociopathic personality.
programme.desc: This series explores six distinctive aspects of the life and rule of Adolf Hitler and questions how a 30-year-old uneducated nobody was able to leave a legacy of unprecedented evil.

programme.title: Mussolini: The First Fascist
programme.desc: 100 years after Mussolinis rise to power, we explore the mechanisms of fascist power and state political repression steering Italy into disaster thanks to archives, amateur footage and testimonies.

programme.sub-title: Two rival rail companies compete to create the most ambitious engineering project the world has ever seen, an unprecedented railway that crosses the American continent.

programme.title: Vikings: The True Story
programme.sub-title: This episode explores the Vikingopolis - the mounds around the fjords at Borre - the truth behind the fabled Fimbulwinter, and whether Thor and Odin actually existed or not.
programme.desc: This two-part documentary challenges much of what we think we know about the great Nordic warrior race; a team of experts and historians in Norway are making astonishing new discoveries.

programme.title: Vikings: The True Story
programme.sub-title: In this episode, we discover more about the slave trade in the Viking age, a second female skeleton found in the Oseburg ship, and an account of a survivor of a Viking slave raid.
programme.desc: This two-part documentary challenges much of what we think we know about the great Nordic warrior race; a team of experts and historians in Norway are making astonishing new discoveries.

programme.desc: This series tells incredible stories from the annals of history about great treasures, long-held conspiracy theories, ancient relics, lost civilisations and wartime secrets.

programme.title: Top Ten Warfare

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: Adolf Hitler was famously against using chemical and biological weapons, but chemistry and biological science still played an incredible role in the Nazis unquenchable quest for power.
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.sub-title: We travel back to the Europe of over a thousand years ago to discover what it meant to be a Viking during the Viking age and explore one of the most exciting archaeological finds of recent times.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: As World War II drags on into another bitter winter, the Allies become desperate to end the conflict. Churchill turns to his formidable bomber force to break the deadlock.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: Hitlers rise to power was a unique moment in history; Germany suffered a humiliating defeat in WWI and was crippled by massive war reparations. Hitler offers a scapegoat: the Jews.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: The final hours of WW2 change the course of history; as the Americans inch closer to Japan, the Japanese fight with greater intensity. The question now is how to force capitulation.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Vikings: The Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: For the first time in a hundred years, a Viking burial ship will be dug up in Norway; with full access to the archaeological site, we will follow every step of this extremely rare excavation.

programme.title: Normandy: Land of Warriors
programme.sub-title: Normandy owes its name to terrible warriors coming from the North: the Vikings. These men ravaged the Norman lands until it was ceded to them and became their territory.
programme.desc: From the Viking invasions to the great sieges of Richard the Lionheart, the history of the Dukes of Normandy is an incredible military epic spanning more than 300 years.

programme.title: Nazi Murder Mysteries
programme.sub-title: We look at the persistent rumours accusing the Duke of Windsor of having been complicit in illegal financial schemes involving laundering Nazi money and influencing the outcome of a murder trial.
programme.desc: A look at some of the most shocking Nazi murder cases. Incorporating expert interviews and dramatic reconstruction, each episode tells another side to a time in history that you thought you knew.

programme.title: Greatest Events of World War II In Colour
programme.sub-title: Britain and France declare war when Hitler invades Poland; in May 1940, the Germans attack Holland and Belgium as a decoy. As the Wehrmacht and Luftwaffe strike in force, the French seem trapped.
programme.desc: A story of World War II told through the ten most pivotal moments in the conflict, supported by exquisitely restored and colourised footage. This is World War II as youve never seen it before.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Science
programme.sub-title: The triumphal architecture of the Nazi regime hints at a deeply dystopian future; what might a Nazi city and the world, have looked like had Hitler succeeded in vanquishing his enemies?
programme.desc: When the Nazi empire collapsed at the end of WWII, the darkest secrets of the Third Reich came to light; this series exposes everything from biological experiments to supersize feats of engineering.

programme.title: From the Ashes of WWII
programme.sub-title: From the brutal devastation of WWII to the stoicism of Soviet-controlled Eastern Europe, this episode explores the tension between Russia and Poland as they rebuilt their societies and cities.
programme.desc: This is the story of how the cities that were attacked, damaged and destroyed during the Second World War rose again and were rebuilt for a new world.

programme.title: Bomber: Terror of WWII
programme.sub-title: The ﬁrst bombs were dropped from balloons; in WWI, Zeppelins and German Gotha bombers made the ﬁrst aerial attacks, but it was between the wars that the strategic use of aerial bombing was expanded.
programme.desc: There have been a catalogue of inventions in the history of warfare that have changed the way battles are fought, but one weapon changed not only the battlefield, but war itself: the bomber.

programme.title: The Secret Story of the Knights Templar
programme.sub-title: The Knights Templar were established as a special religious-military order within the tradition of medieval knighthood, but the rise and fall of the Order involves several secrets and mysteries.
programme.desc: Discover the developments that led the famous Knights Templar to extreme power and to subsequently become the target of an unprecedented campaign of hatred.

programme.title: Minu verine valentinipaev (2009)
programme.desc: Tom naaseb koju 22 inimese elu nõudnud valentinipaeva veresauna kumnendal aastapaeval. Kojutulekupeo asemel leiab Tom end kahtlustatuna mõrvade sooritamises.

programme.title: Valvurid
programme.desc: 1985. aasta USAs. Keegi otsustab havitada ameerika tuntuimad superkangelased või nende maine. Peategelane Rorschach kogub kokku Valvurid, et ohule vastu astuda.

programme.title: Uus tutar
programme.desc: Üksikisa kolib oma kahe lapsega Lõuna-Carolina maakohta. Seal markab ta, et tema tutar hakkab aina kummalisemalt kaituma.

programme.desc: FBI agent Roy Clayton juhib ohtliku rahvusvahelise vandenõu uurimist. Kõik juhtlõngad viivat tagasi endise USA erioperatsioonide ohvitseri Samir Hornini.

programme.title: Must valgus
programme.desc: Travis Block on valitsusametnik, kes puuab leppida oma tumeda minevikuga. Avastanud vandenõu USA kodanike vastu, satub ta FBI peadirektori sihikule.

Ta on harjunud, et poolõde on alati juures ja neil ei ole saladusi. Siis tekib Marini ellu restoranikriitik Alex ning tema puhendumine armastusele ajab õed tulli.

programme.desc: Inimesed peavad kohanema sunteetilise keskkonnaga, mis toob kaasa transformatsiooni ja mutatsioone. Saul ja tema partner Caprice demonstreerivad tulevikuhõngulistel performanceitel oma elundite metamorfoosi.

programme.title: Ära raagi kurja
programme.desc: Taani perekond kukastab hollandi peret, kellega tutvuti reisil. Oodatud idulliline nadalavahetus hakkab aga koost lagunema, kuigi taanlased puuavad ebameeldivuste kiuste viisakaks jaada.

programme.title: Ohtliku mehe pihtimus

programme.title: Põlenud malestused
programme.desc: Hiljuti lesestunud naine kutsub varalahkunud abikaasa hadas oleva parima sõbra koos tolle kahe lapsega enda juurde elama. Mees ajab end aegamisi jalule ning aitab perenaisel hakkama saada ja leinaga toime tulla.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Kolmest mustanahalisest soulilauljast koosnev trio satub 1960ndate alguses popmuusika edetabelitesse. Samal ajal on igauhel neist ka isiklikus elus piisavalt keeruline.

programme.title: Moonacrei saladus
programme.desc: Maria parib isalt salaparase raamatu ja kolib elama oma onu Moonacrei mõisa. Orul lasub perekondlik needus, mille vaid Maria saab raamatu abiga maha võtta.

programme.title: Nõiutud kuningriik 3D
programme.desc: Lummav teekond labi looduse nõidusliku maagia.

programme.title: Teekond malestustesse

programme.title: Vabaliikumises
programme.desc: Suurlinnas elav teismeline Ren MacCormac kolib vaikelinna, kus on keelustatud rockmuusika ja tantsimine. Nooruki massumeelne vastuhakk raputab kohalikke.

programme.desc: Draama keskendub John ja Aileen Crowley puudlustele leida teadlane, kes võiks aidata terveks ravida nende kaks haruldast geneetilist haigust põdevat last.

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: Koduaresti all elav teismeline peategelane hakkab uskuma, et tema naaber on sarimõrvar.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Darryl the kookaburra has been hit by a car and head vet Dr Bree needs to operate on his wing to save him; Jethro, a tiny green tree frog, needs a check-up after being squashed in a car door.
programme.desc: At the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital, Dr Bree and her team are dedicated to saving Australian wildlife; they treat every animal - from tiny echidnas to koalas and kangaroos - from their vet truck.

programme.title: Outback Vet
programme.sub-title: Dr Katy has been given custody of two endangered Hawksbill turtles in Karratha - we follow their journey back to the sea; Ed and Dunc collect squid for their sustainable eating display in Ocean Park.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: There is an enormous territory of plains in the north of South America that changes its appearance twice a year; we discover the capybara, gigantic anacondas, and the few remaining Orinoco crocodiles.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter removes an oven glove from terrier Wesleys stomach and an optometrist spots a problem with his daughters pet rabbit Patch; Julian makes the difficult decision to remove an eye.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: A special episode focusing on births and babies; Julian heads to a local farm where a cow is struggling in labour, and baby goat Daisy has serious eye problems that are affecting her sight.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt arrives in eastern Zambia to film three packs of wild dogs - the Manzis, Kakulis and Stork Colony - in three very different territories.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its 100 degrees and rising; as waterholes dry up, Julz is alarmed to find lions in the Kakuli packs favourite drinking spot but also gets to touch a wild dog for the first time ever.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Darryl the kookaburra has been hit by a car and head vet Dr Bree needs to operate on his wing to save him; Jethro, a tiny green tree frog, needs a check-up after being squashed in a car door.

programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Peter rushes into Skeldale on his day off to try to save a lamb of Richard Bells, and Julians treating a very poorly one-week old llama called Noah at Suzanne Bensons trekking centre.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian heads to the historic Harewood House near Leeds to check on some goats who are moving to a new enclosure, and Peter heads over to help when a young farmer struggles with a tricky lambing.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Julian is at Jackies alpaca farm to see one of his favourite alpacas, and Peters at Arthur Almonds farm because three of his cows need dehorning... but they arent used to being handled.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Its Sunday morning, but its no day of rest for Julian as he heads to the Taylors farm; at Skeldale, shih-tzu puppy Lester - who needs surgery on a hernia - has all the staff purring.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: River Monsters
programme.sub-title: When he hears of a recent attack in a Mongolian river, Jeremy wonders if it could be the work of a giant fish; with gold miners poisoning its last hideouts, its anyones guess if its still alive.
programme.desc: Extreme angler Jeremy Wade is on the hunt for freshwater fish with a taste for human flesh. Using forensic methods, Jeremy illustrates to the viewer how these river monsters are constructed to kill.

programme.title: Lost Beasts: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: This episode explores a unique dig site in America to investigate how the T-Rex became the king of the dinosaurs.
programme.desc: From deadly T. rexes to giant woolly mammoths, new evidence reveals how giant beasts evolved to conquer the planet, how they grew so big, and what triggered their extinction.

programme.title: Lost Beasts: Unearthed
programme.sub-title: This episode examines a unique dig site in Egypt that could help solve the mystery of how prehistoric land mammals evolved into top ocean predators.
programme.desc: From deadly T. rexes to giant woolly mammoths, new evidence reveals how giant beasts evolved to conquer the planet, how they grew so big, and what triggered their extinction.

programme.title: Ice Age: A Frozen World
programme.sub-title: Steve Backshall and Michaela Strachan witness the rise of mega beasts like the woolly mammoth and sabretooth cat; we reveal how these mighty creatures survived such savage environmental extremes.
programme.desc: Naturalist and explorer Steve Backshall - and wildlife presenter Michaela Strachan - take us on a gripping journey into the heart of the Ice Age.

programme.title: Giants
programme.sub-title: Dan ONeills on a mission to find and film Earths biggest wild lions; he heads to Botswana in search of a known giant male, but can he track him down?
programme.desc: Explorer, biologist and conservationist Dan ONeill is on the trail of the largest living animals in the world; what does it take to become and survive as a giant past or present?

programme.title: Adapt to Survive
programme.sub-title: In many social animal groups, evicted males team up to form a single formidable force that can overthrow the alpha; these powerhouses are better known as male coalitions.
programme.desc: In this series, we delve into the mysterious world of animals and their methods to survive; take a journey into some of the wild worlds secret survival strategies that allows life to perpetuate.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Careful where you step - hidden beneath logs, in trees, empty burrows and long grass are creatures so deadly that one bite is enough to take down a full-grown elephant.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.sub-title: This is the story of how Australias snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem on one of the harshest and most extreme continents on Earth.
programme.desc: This two-part series takes you on an epic journey through the most harsh - yet exquisite - landscapes and habitats to uncover the remarkable world of Australia and Africas most extreme snakes.

programme.title: Wild Battleground
programme.sub-title: From rivers to oceans, water wars rewrite the rules of conflict; gravity has no meaning underwater. Weird and wonderful creatures of the reef terrorise each other as they battle for an inch of space.
programme.desc: We show how animals use their unique attributes to defeat their opponents; they have honed their skills for millennia and have become masters of communication, camouflage, diplomacy and combat.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Theres a shock in the borderlands where the Stork Colony pack roams, Vultures, elephants, baboons, and hyenas make for noisy neighbours for the Manzi pack, and the Kakuli pack goes missing.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Julz discovers lions in Manzi territory and is relieved when he finds the dogs safe, a brave puku antelope foils a Kakuli pack hunt, and the Stork pack recovers after losing a pup.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: A future dispersal of young adult dogs in the Manzi pack looks inevitable, the dry season forces the Kakuli pack to take risks, and ecologist Henry identifies a new dog who has joined the Stork pack.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack and join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Program on a house call to the Kakumbi den where another pup has gone missing.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack and a Manzi faction thats ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Natures Mass Attacks
programme.sub-title: We focus on the iconic migratory animals of Africa, North America and Oceania as they travel long distances through some of the worlds most stunning landscapes and battle extreme odds of survival.
programme.desc: We follow the worlds best pack hunters; from the iconic grey wolf to the surprising collaboration between humans and dolphins, these are predators at their most inventive and cunning.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: Wade into wetlands where trees and water meet to nurture new life; dive into an underwater forest that protects young fur seals, visit a mangrove sanctuary, and meet some real-life swamp monsters.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: Climb into a realm of thin air and towering rock; tag along as mythical monkeys battle for a winter food stash, and sing along with lemurs in a fruit-filled tree canopy.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Natures Fast Attacks
programme.sub-title: This first episode features footage showing the lightning-fast moves that predators deploy to capture their prey and the rapid escape tactics that will see who wins these high-velocity battles.
programme.desc: In this two-part documentary series, we see footage that captures the lightning-fast moves used to ambush prey and make equally rapid escapes in the terrifying moments between life and death.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Jack the coastal carpet python has had a run-in with a tractor and needs surgery; Prickles the echidna has been hit by a car and Dr Bree works to pop his dislocated leg back into place.
programme.desc: At the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital, Dr Bree and her team are dedicated to saving Australian wildlife; they treat every animal - from tiny echidnas to koalas and kangaroos - from their vet truck.

programme.sub-title: Katy treats a Staffie with a deadly disease, a Great Dane rescues a dog needing a blood transfusion, and Rick and zoologist Ed Swinhoe test a wild dingos DNA in the outback near Exmouth.
programme.desc: Meet Rick Fenny, a 40-year career veterinarian; he regularly embarks on a round trip across Western Australia to visit remote clients, working with animals in some of the most hostile conditions.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: The Caribbean Sea is a mythical place with a wild jungle world living on its shores; this region is home to the axolotls, the Montezuma oropendola, dozens of species of tree frogs, and pit vipers.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: A Year on Planet Earth
programme.sub-title: Transformation is enormous as the Northern Hemisphere starts to face the suns rays in March; spring is a season of opportunity as the great melt begins and new life erupts.
programme.desc: We journey around the Sun in this series and witness the incredible strategies that animals use to cope with every season in their constantly changing worlds.

programme.sub-title: A future dispersal of young adult dogs in the Manzi pack looks inevitable, the dry season forces the Kakuli pack to take risks, and ecologist Henry identifies a new dog who has joined the Stork pack.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Its Julzs last week; an encounter with lions scatters the Stork pack, Julz spots the Kakuli puppies feeding on a puku carcass, and the Manzi pack fight a warthog by the Luangwa River.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi, the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs, and yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack and join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Program on a house call to the Kakumbi den where another pup has gone missing.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Join Julz and park scout Simon Chulu as they track the Kakuli pack and a Manzi faction thats ditched a tracking collar and broken away from the group.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs Pride
programme.sub-title: Julz and Henry from the ZCP track the Kakumbi pups as they face off with a warthog, and Thandie Mweetwa - ZCPs lion specialist - counts the prides that are pushing the Manzi out of their territory.
programme.desc: Cameraman Julz Braatvedt returns to the South Luangwa National Park to see the Kakumbi, Manzi and Kakuli packs back in action alongside lions, warthogs, buffalo, leopards, elephants and hyenas.

programme.title: A Game of Leopard Thrones
programme.sub-title: Thanks to Hosanas exceptional hunting skills, Tingana rebuilds his strength, finally challenges Hukumuri for the dukedom, defeats him and keeps his cubs safe.
programme.desc: The queen of the leopard royal family of the Djuma Private Game Reserve in the Sabi Sands of South Africa has passed on - who will be crowned as the next leopard king and queen?

programme.title: Earth from Space
programme.sub-title: Earths surface appears from space to be covered in wonderful shapes; as wombats dig burrows across the Australian outback, elephants in the Congo clear an opening in a forest.
programme.desc: Cameras in space tell stories of life on our planet from a brand-new perspective as they reveal new discoveries, incredible colours and patterns, and just how fast it is changing.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests; meet a sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their gardens.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests
programme.sub-title: We watch the seasons wax and wane; witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prepare for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.
programme.desc: Traverse the planets richest and most diverse woodlands - from the tropics to the poles and everywhere in between - and learn how forests connect and nurture the lives of countless species.

programme.title: Adapt to Survive
programme.sub-title: In many social animal groups, evicted males team up to form a single formidable force that can overthrow the alpha; these powerhouses are better known as male coalitions.
programme.desc: In this series, we delve into the mysterious world of animals and their methods to survive; take a journey into some of the wild worlds secret survival strategies that allows life to perpetuate.

programme.title: Deadly Hunters
programme.sub-title: Careful where you step - hidden beneath logs, in trees, empty burrows and long grass are creatures so deadly that one bite is enough to take down a full-grown elephant.
programme.desc: We take a look at some of the animals that have led the way in refining their skills as masterful huntsmen; using their size, strength and unique weapons, animals use it all in order to survive.

programme.title: Extreme Snakes
programme.sub-title: This is the story of how Australias snakes evolved, over millions of years, to thrive and become dominant predators in every ecosystem on one of the harshest and most extreme continents on Earth.
programme.desc: This two-part series takes you on an epic journey through the most harsh - yet exquisite - landscapes and habitats to uncover the remarkable world of Australia and Africas most extreme snakes.

programme.title: Wild Battleground
programme.sub-title: From rivers to oceans, water wars rewrite the rules of conflict; gravity has no meaning underwater. Weird and wonderful creatures of the reef terrorise each other as they battle for an inch of space.
programme.desc: We show how animals use their unique attributes to defeat their opponents; they have honed their skills for millennia and have become masters of communication, camouflage, diplomacy and combat.

programme.title: Wild West
programme.sub-title: This second part takes us up to the High Country to uncover a hardy breed of wildlife that embodies a pioneering spirit found nowhere else on earth; survival demands endurance and know-how.
programme.desc: We visit Americas Wild West, home of desert landscapes like the Grand Canyon, Death Valley, Monument Valley, giant redwood forests and extreme coastlines that have been forged over millennia.

programme.title: The Rockies Wild Corridor: From Yellowstone To Yukon
programme.sub-title: Reindeer are seriously endangered in southern Canada; however, the fate of one of their herds is improving thanks to an exemplary conservation plan initiated by Indigenous peoples.
programme.desc: We observe the deployment of a revolutionary initiative - and new concept of nature conservation - in the Yellowstone to Yukon corridor, an idea that preserves the heritage of Yellowstone Park.

programme.title: The Rockies Wild Corridor: From Yellowstone To Yukon
programme.sub-title: Wolves roam the Canadian Northwest in significant numbers; in this northern extremity of the Rockies, humans and wolves are learning to coexist and are building a common future today.
programme.desc: We observe the deployment of a revolutionary initiative - and new concept of nature conservation - in the Yellowstone to Yukon corridor, an idea that preserves the heritage of Yellowstone Park.

programme.title: San Andreas: A Race Against Time
programme.desc: The San Andreas Fault is the junction point of two tectonic plates stretching across San Francisco and Los Angeles; it is 1,300km long and currently the most surveyed phenomenon in the world.

programme.title: Wildlife Rescue Australia
programme.sub-title: Dr Bree and the team at the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital check out an adorable five-week-old flying fox with a sore wing and Lover the green sea turtle, who has had a run-in with a boat propeller.
programme.desc: At the Byron Bay Wildlife Hospital, Dr Bree and her team are dedicated to saving Australian wildlife; they treat every animal - from tiny echidnas to koalas and kangaroos - from their vet truck.

programme.title: The Bizarre Pet Vets
programme.sub-title: Dr James sees an emergency case involving two pets, Dr Kiara has concerns about a lump on blue-tongue skink Edward, and Dr Kelly performs tiny surgery on two very small German ram fish.
programme.desc: Dr James Haberfield and his team from Unusual Pet Vets treat the most bizarre and beloved animals in Australia; with three clinics across the country, they see hundreds of species every week.

programme.title: Wild LatAm
programme.sub-title: A large part of the jungle that covers Central and South America is known as the rainforest; it is home to howler monkeys, jaguars, iguanas, bush dogs and king vultures.
programme.desc: A vibrant portrait of the biodiverse habitats in South America; inhabitants range from large to small, from colourful to perfectly camouflaged, and from the lone hunter to thousand-strong hordes.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: This episode marks International Dog Day; Julian has performed lots of surgery on his clients four-legged friends, but its a bit different when the patient is his own faithful companion Emmy.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.sub-title: Bull Pip needs an urgent foot trim, but hes reluctant to lie down and allow Peter do his job; in Boroughbridge, Julian and Katy are operating on Berties the beagles leg.
programme.desc: Skeldales team have a real passion for animals; with a clientele that rarely has insurance, animal welfare always comes before profit together with an extra dose of tender loving care.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Running with the Pack
programme.sub-title: Julz discovers lions in Manzi territory and is relieved when he finds the dogs safe, a brave puku antelope foils a Kakuli pack hunt, and the Stork pack recovers after losing a pup.
programme.desc: Wildlife cameraman Julz Braatvedt visits the South Luangwa National Park in eastern Zambia to follow three wild dog packs for six weeks during the dry season.
